# GSCM Research Library

### 

**The library is open on _Thursday_ ,  _Friday_ , and  _Saturday_ each week, with the hours of _12-4._** ** Due to volunteer staffing limitations, please contact us in advance to make sure a volunteer will be on duty to open the library.  ****[info@BooneCoMoGen.org](mailto:info@BooneCoMoGen.org)** **[_Click here for the Library catalog_](http://boonecomogen.org/libraryRecords.php)** **Location** _**The Genealogical Society of Boone County and Central Missouri**_ calls the Wilson-Wulff Library "home". We are staffed by GSCM member volunteers. We are a separate organization from the Boone County Historical Society and are fortunate to house our collection in the Boone County History and Cult...
admission_text:
[ Join or Renew Online ](https://boonehistory.charityproud.org/Membership/Signup)

## Stories. History. Inspiration.

### Your membership makes it all possible!

## BCHS Membership Benefits

  * Sneak peek of new online digital collections, which now boasts 60,000+ historic records and photographs

  * Private members only Facebook group

  * Exclusive events

  * Monthly  _News & Notes_ newsletter, packed with the latest news, local history, events and exhibits

  * 15% discount on most Center Store items

  * 30% discount on all venue rentals for your special events

  * Special discounted rates at signature events like the annual Boone County Hall of Fame Gala

  * Advance notice and invitations to events, workshops & programs

  * The pride and prestige of belonging to your community’s History and Culture Center

  * **Patron Level & Above:** Benefits at 1,000+ museums, gardens, zoos and more in the [NARMAssociation®](https://narmassociation.org)

  * **Gold & Platinum** **Level:** Receive VIP behind the scenes tours of the Center’s vaults and grounds.

## Membership Impact

Your membership is a statement. If you believe the vibrant stories of your community are not only important but can also inspire the next generation—join or renew.

Your dues directly support our mission and provide for:

  * Internationally recognized history exhibitions

  * Groundbreaking in-person and virtual art exhibits in the [Montminy Gallery](https://boonehistory.org/montminy-art-gallery)

## Available to Rent

### Maplewood

This splendid home was built in 1877 and is on the National Historic Register. It is a unique location for your next bridal shower or tea. It can host small groups of up 20 in its magnificent first floor.

[Read More](https://boonehistory.org/historic-maplewood-house/)

### Montminy Art Gallery

The gallery is a very popular rental for luncheons, cocktail receptions, sales awards meetings and small wedding receptions. Its horse-shoe shaped 2600 sq. feet features art exhibits by the region's best artists.

[Read More](https://boonehistory.org/montminy-art-gallery/)

### Veranda and Gazebo

The covered veranda and the large, adjacent gazebo provide a vista of beautiful and historic Nifong Park with the Maplewood House peeking through the trees. A popular location for happy hour receptions and wedding receptions.
